wikitext.*:
'''Náin''' can refer to three [[Dwarves]]:
* [[Náin I]] ({{TA|1832}} - {{TA|1981}}), the last [[Kings of Khazad-dûm|King of Khazad-dûm]], killed by [[Durin's Bane]].
* [[Náin II]] ({{TA|2338}} - {{TA|2585}}), who ruled [[Durin's folk]] from the [[Grey Mountains]].
* [[Náin (son of Grór)]] ({{TA|2665}} - {{TA|2799}}), who fought, and died, at the [[Battle of Azanulbizar]].
{{DEFAULTSORT:Nain (disambiguation}}
